bibl.title: Lycophron on Io and Isis.
bibl.note: Lycophron, Alexandra 1291-1295 [cf. Stephanie West, Lycophron on Isis, JEA 70 (1984) pp. 151-154]. - 1. The 'Bull-Maid Girl'. - 2. Isis as the Mother of Apis. - 3. The Elusive Father and the Memphite Lord. - 4. A Rare Artistic Phase.
bibl.seg: Griffiths J. Gwyn, Lycophron on Io and Isis.

Lycophron, Alexandra 1291-1295 [cf. Stephanie West, Lycophron on Isis, JEA 70 (1984) pp. 151-154]. - 1. The 'Bull-Maid Girl'. - 2. Isis as the Mother of Apis. - 3. The Elusive Father and the Memphite Lord. - 4. A Rare Artistic Phase.
